class.title: Just Jump
class.text: âš¡ Are you an avid runner who never gets tired of playing the game while running? In that case, Stumble Guys is the finest option for you all, guys, since this most recent gaming series consistently supports gamers. Experience some of the intriguing game stories with settings that suit your preferences now. Therefore, continue using this Stumble Guys top hints guide to manage the game and defeat your opponents in this never-ending gaming concept.

class.title: Tips & Tricks: Aiming
class.text:
âš¡ Practice makes you perfect The best way to improve aiming is practising as many weapons as you canto familiarize yourself with them. Try to hit the moving targets. 

âš¡ place your crosshair properly and focus very necessary tips while aiming; it's a time of focus ; it might seem hard at the beginning but after one week or two of practicing it, you will notcie a big difference and how pro you really are !

class.title: Tips & Tricks: Moving Targets
class.text:
âš¡ Moving Targets 
 - 100m away... imagine there's one person just ahead of them and shoot this position. 
 - 200m away... lead your target by two imaginary people. 

âš¡ Your first shoots might not hit the target, but they are giving you an idea about distance and where to next adapt your gun.

class.title: Tips & Tricks: Pro Strategies
class.text:
âš¡ Play in the edge of the circle (25 ALIVE) This is a good tactic and a great choice; specially when your teammates are dead; imagine you're on your own surrounded by many teams; Do you think it's a good idea ? absolutely not ; so you better have to stay at the edges of the zone until you know everyone's place ,and this could be you secret key to many wins. 

âš¡ ALWAYS take a level three helmet......but sometimes leave a level three vest While comparing helmets; the level 3 helmet is always the great choice even if it's damaged; Unlike the vests; a damaged level 3 vest does not anymore provide you any safety while it's fully damaged.

class.title: Tips & Tricks: Weapons & Aiming
class.text:
âš¡ Aim Over Long Distances 
 The distance travelled by each gun's bullet is different (muzzle speeds). For exampl SMG's bullets can go so far, unlike snipers or assault riffles ; So the right choice is to choise a sniper or an assault riffle for long distace; assault riffles ar really good in long distances while they're on Single mode, using a higher scope as x4 or x6 
 This is how to use the 4X scope at different ranges.

class.title: UC & RP
class.text:
âš¡ Taking up online surveys & completing offers is one of the easiest ways to get Free UC & RP for free. We make a giveaway every week for 20 to 30 of the top users with the most points, you can get points by completing offers.
